title: Ep 86 | Breaking Coronavirus Laws, Ungodly Politicians & Phil's Biblical Advice: 'Chill Out, Man'
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al discuss coronavirus regulations in America and whether or not social distancing has disrupted the work of the church. Phil wonders what exactly the U.S. government has done for us lately, and Al thinks we may be living in a communist's dream. The guys also tackle the danger of ungodly politicians and offer advice to a believer who feels like he's not good enough for heaven. And Phil surprises everyone with his knowledge of 1990s pop culture
